hasSubcontracting.title: Subcontracting involved
hasSubcontracting.description: Whether a part of the contract will be subcontracted.

subcontracting.title: Subcontracting
subcontracting.description: Information about the parts of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.

Subcontracting.title: Subcontracting
Subcontracting.description: Information about the parts of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the part of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.

maximumPercentage.title: Maximum percentage of contract value
maximumPercentage.description: The maximum percentage of the contract value that will be subcontracted.

minimumPercentage.title: Minimum percentage of contract value
minimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage of the contract value that will be subcontracted.

competitiveMaximumPercentage.title: Maximum percentage of total value for competitive subcontracting
competitiveMaximumPercentage.description: Maximum percentage of the contract value required to be subcontracted through a competitive procedure.

competitiveMinimumPercentage.title: Minimum percentage of total value for competitive subcontracting
competitiveMinimumPercentage.description: Minimum percentage of the contract value required to be subcontracted through a competitive procedure.

value.title: Subcontracted value
value.description: The estimated value of the part of the contract that the contractor will subcontract to third parties.

competitive.title: Competitive subcontracting
competitive.description: Whether the contract will be subcontracted through a competitive procedure.
